section.title: Confirm
section.para: The confirm validate checks whether the value provided is the same as the context value. This is particularly useful in validating password fields with Zend_Form.

example.title: Using Zym_Validate_Confirm
example.para: The construct requires the field name of the context value if it is an array. The context value can be provided in the contructor if you are using the validator by itself or Zend_Filter_Input. With Zend_Form, the context is handled automatically.

section.title: StringEquals
section.para: Validates whether all strings in an array are equal.
